Wellspring Home Services

Custom Website Design & Development

Starting out as a handyman service company in 2015, Wellspring Home Services has grown into a residential remodeling contractor over the past several years. With its growth came the need to improve its website's design, branding, performance, SEO, and mobile-friendliness. JordanCox.dev undertook the project in late December, launching the website in February after planning, designing, developing, and writing content for wellspringhomeservices.com. Additionally, JordanCox.dev set up custom domain email addresses for Wellspring's staff.
